policies.involuntary_refund:
• Eligible if HX cancels flight, causes missed connection, or fails to stop at destination.
• 100% refund if unused; otherwise, refund based on unused portion.
• Must be requested within 60 days of disrupted flight.
• Refund not applicable if processed at airport.

Refund on Lost Tickets:
• Available 3 months after expiry with proof of loss, indemnity form, and admin fee.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
• Rebooking due to flight irregularities must be processed within 10 days of the affected flight.
• New flight must depart within 2 days before or 7 days after original date.
• Change must be to first available HX-operated flight.
• One-time waiver applies only; further changes subject to fare rules.
• Fare/tax difference collected if new routing is more expensive.
• Group tickets must be handled via local support; not eligible for FIT waivers.
policies.voluntary_refund:
Voluntary Refunds:
• Must follow fare rules; refund amount may be reduced by cancellation or service fees.
• Unused portion: refunded as difference between fare paid and used portion.
• Request must be made through original issuing office.
• Refunds only issued to original payer upon proof of purchase.
• No refund for expired tickets unless required by law.
• Fare rules vary by region and are strictly enforced.
policies.medical_refund:
• Applies to FIT (individual) tickets only.
• Delay >3 hours, flight cancellation, interline misconnection, or HX minimum connection time updates qualify.
• One-time reissue or reroute permitted per policy window.
• Refund waiver applies even on non-refundable tickets if submitted within 60 days of the affected flight.
• No waiver if passenger is a no-show.
• Rerouting limited to same regional zone (China/Japan).
policies.name_change:
Individual Bookings (FIT):
• One-time free change allowed for:
  → Title/gender correction
  → Middle name correction
  → Inverted name order
  → ≤3-character spelling fix
  → Legal changes (marriage, divorce, etc.) with documentation
• All other changes: HKD 400 or equivalent applies

Group Bookings:
• Same free-change rules apply
• Additional changes:
  → HKD 500 (normal season)
  → HKD 800 (peak season)

Tour Leader:
• Fee waived with medical certificate and staff ID
• Otherwise subject to same HKD 500–800 fee

OSI Required Post-Change:
• Add OSI: 'OSI HX NAME CHANGE FM [OLD] TO [NEW] X NAME CHANGE FEE [WAIVED OR COLLECTED]'
• If change done at airport: annotate PNR and notify CSC.
policies.group_booking:
• Group tickets must be handled via local support channels.
• Name changes and reissues follow group fee matrix:
  → HKD 500 (standard)
  → HKD 800 (peak season)
• Tour leader name changes waived for medical emergencies (proof required)
• Group rebooking support handled offline
• No B2C support offered by APG USA—must contact local station
policies.infant_policy:
• Infants under 7 days old are not permitted.
• One infant per adult allowed.
• Infant ticket fare and baggage allowance vary by region.
• Service animals permitted per disability rules.
• Cradles, child seats, or bassinets available on request based on aircraft and seat availability.
policies.baggage_policy:
• Carry-on: must fit under seat or in overhead bin; size and weight limits apply.
• Checked: 32kg max per piece; fees apply for excess or overweight baggage.
• Fare families determine free checked bag allowance.
• No valuables or fragile items in checked baggage.
• Firearms, weapons, and hazardous materials not allowed unless approved in advance.
• Service animals allowed in cabin free of charge under conditions.
• Lost baggage must be reported within 21 days; damaged baggage within 7 days.
• Musical instruments or oversized items must be approved in advance.
policies.seat_request_policy:
• Seat assignment is not guaranteed even if preselected.
• Carrier may reassign for operational, safety, or legal reasons.
• Special meals, Wi-Fi, and inflight services not guaranteed and may vary by fare family.
• Refund for seat fees available only if involuntarily changed.
• Advance seat selection restricted by fare tier and availability.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
• Voluntary cancellations are subject to fare rules.
• Refunds permitted only to original form of payment.
• No refund if travel documents are missing or visa denied.
• No refund if used as proof of outbound travel without departure
• Airport refunds are not allowed.
• Refund of airport taxes only if cancellation is beyond validity or required by law.
